rows.label: qev090405_MSG0001
rows.name:
Looks like you'll be working with Bozé this time.
Good luck! Come home safe![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090405_MSG0002
rows.name: Welcome back. How was the mission?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090405_MSG0003
rows.name: Not half-bad, thanks to the fine partner you scouted for me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090405_MSG0004_m
rows.name: With his help, we got Reggie home safe and sound.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090405_MSG0004_f
rows.name: With her help, we got Reggie home safe and sound.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090405_MSG0005
rows.name: Am I hearing things?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090405_MSG0006
rows.name: Every other recruit I paired you with has come home in tears.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090405_MSG0007
rows.name: They...usually get a little overwhelmed from all the lectures.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090405_JNK0010
rows.name: Downplay

rows.label: qev090405_SEL0011
rows.name: Claim that you have learned much from Bozé.

rows.label: qev090405_JNK0020
rows.name: Brag

rows.label: qev090405_SEL0021
rows.name: Assure Eleonora that you are not like other BLADEs.

rows.label: qev090405_MSG0008
rows.name:
You see? Such humility is at the heart
of true Eastern philosophy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090405_MSG0009
rows.name:
I see potential in this one.
That said, there is still much work to do. [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090405_MSG0010
rows.name:
If we'd met at the academy,
I could have trained you from the ground up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090405_MSG0011
rows.name: What a shame.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090405_MSG0012
rows.name:
But perhaps it's not too late.
Why don't we keep working together?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090405_MSG0013
rows.name:
I can help make you one of the true BLADE elites!
...Well? What say you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090405_JNK0030
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev090405_SEL0031
rows.name: Offer yourself to Bozé as his pupil.

rows.label: qev090405_JNK0040
rows.name: Decline

rows.label: qev090405_SEL0041
rows.name: Turn Bozé down in no uncertain terms.

rows.label: qev090405_MSG0014
rows.name: Your answer pleases me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090405_MSG0015
rows.name:
In truth, I'd have taught you anyway.
This just saves me the trouble.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090405_MSG0016
rows.name:
Too late. It's already decided.
This is a thing that is happening![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090405_MSG0017_m
rows.name:
Now, let us start again as master and pupil.
I am Bozé Lowes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090405_MSG0017_f
rows.name:
Now, let us start again as master and pupil.
I am Bozé Lowes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090405_MSG0018
rows.name:
People call me the Harrier Hammer,
for my fists pound any deviation straight![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090405_MSG0019
rows.name: From this moment on, you are my pupil...and my friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090405_MSG0020
rows.name:
Together, we'll craft a home for humankind to rival Earth.
Now let's get started![ST:wait ]
